casebody.data:
NEWBERNE
v.
CRIME CONTROL, et al. No. 75A05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. April 12, 2005. J. Heydt Philbeck, Raleigh, for Reginald Newberne. Mark A. Davis, Raleigh, for Asso. of County Commissioners. J. Michael McGuinness, Charlotte, for NC Academy of Trial Lawyers & AC. Luke Largess, Charlotte, for NC Academy of Trial Lawyers & AC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 12th day of April 2005 by Defendant for extension of time to file brief on 18 April 2005:

"Motion Allowed. Defendant (Department of Crime Control, et al.) shall have up to and including the 18th day of April 2005 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court. By order of the Court in conference this the 12th day of April 2005."
